text: affirmative notification required a creditor shall give a consumer affirmative notification weeks prior to referral of any bill to collection in this chapter affirmative notification means contact by certified mail telephone communication or home visit or posting of a notice of debt on a consumer s door in a solid envelope marked confidential and endorsed with the consumer s name no debt collector shall leave a message of debt on a recording device no debt collector shall discuss a debt with a third party as described by the fair debt collection practices act fdcpa u s section c b other than a discussion initiated by the customer with a state agency
